parent_issue.title: Feature requiring review changes
parent_issue.body:
## Description

A feature that will pass CI but require changes during review.

## Requirements

- Implement initial feature
- Address review feedback

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Initial implementation passes CI
- [ ] Review changes are addressed
- [ ] Final review approves
